Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-23166 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-23166 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.20.3-7, affected by CVE-2025-23166
